name: 林哲宇
objective:
Contents:
1. Atomic structure, crystal structure, microstructure, and phase of materials
2. Mechanical properties of materials (fatigue, fracture, creep)
3. Electrical/optical/magnetic/thermal properties of materials, and 
4. Applications of materials in electromechanical structures.
Objectives: 
To improve the related knowledge of materials on electrical-mechanical structure/devices.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction / Type of materials
Week 2 Atomic Structure and Bonding
Week 3 Crystalline Structure Fundamentals
Week 4 Structure of Crystalline Solids
Week 5 Imperfection in Solids
Week 6 Diffusion
Week 7 Mechanical Properties of Metals
Week 8 Dislocation and Strengthen Mechanisms
Week 9 Fracture
Week 10 Phase Diagrams
Week 11 Phase Transformation
Week 12 Application of Metals / Ceramics / Composites

Week 13 Midterm Exam

Week 14 Student presentation (Electronic properties of materials)
Week 15 Student presentation (Thermal properties of materials)
Week 16 Student presentation (Magnetic properties of materials)
Week 17 Student presentation (Optical properties of materials)
Week 18 Student presentation (Mechanical properties of materials)
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam (30%, Close Book test)
Student Presentation (30%)
Participance / Quiz / Rollcall (40%)
materials: Materials Science and Engineering, by Ccallister and Rethwisch, 9th ed., SI version, Wiley Pub.
